improvements.reason: Added SpecSummary dataclass, gather_specs() method, and specs field on RepoStateSnapshot to fully model spec pipeline state per PRD requirements
Extended AutopilotSession and AutopilotRunner to support --until trigger via stop_trigger parameter and matches_stop_trigger() method in CheckpointSystem
Added reconcile_with_state() method to GoalTracker that auto-updates goal statuses based on linked_feature, linked_bug, and linked_spec fields matching actual repo state
Added AutopilotSessionStore for persisting sessions to .swarm/chief-of-staff/autopilot/, resume() method in AutopilotRunner, and --resume CLI flag to enable pause/resume workflow
Added AutopilotSessionStore component, updated architecture diagram, and documented session persistence flow for checkpoint handling
Added detailed implementation notes for spec gathering, goal reconciliation, and autopilot resume with code examples

remaining_issues.description: Weekly summary generation (generate_weekly_summary) is mentioned but not fully specified with template format
Error handling for concurrent autopilot sessions (what if user tries to start new while one is paused) not specified
